#summary FastWave is designed to accelerate seismic wave modeling specially for reverse time migration and inversion that need intensive computation.

= Introduction =
FastWave is an opensource code software used for seismic wave modeling in complex media with staggered-grid finite difference method on Graphics Processing Units.
